item.title: Simple model file
List of the models
item.description: Here is a list of all models available for each process. Interception There are three different models available in ARCHIMED-φ to compute their light interception and scattering: Translucent, ignore and VirtualSensor. Translucent This model has two set of parameters : transparency: between 0 and 1. 0 is not transparent (opaque), and 1 fully transparent. If it is set to e.g. 0.3, 70% of the incoming light is intercepted by the component (interception = radiation * (1-transparency)), and 30% is directly transmitted (not being part of the interception).

item.title: Soil model
item.description: The soil file is the same as any plant file so far (e.g. group, type, model parameters), but will be populated with new parameters soon. It is identified as a soil file if it uses the Cobblestone component type: --- Group: pavement Type: Cobblestone: Interception: model: Translucent transparency: 0 optical_properties: PAR: 0.15 NIR: 0.9 plot_paving: 80 ... The Cobblestone type is a special type that defines a soil as a plane, discretized in cobblestones for the light interception.
